primary.note: Spanish primary keyword for /es/ page targeting US Hispanic audience. English variant 'gold cup final' (11,000/mo) included as secondary for bilingual searchers.

competitor_analysis.serp_overview: SERP for 'copa oro final' shows limited Spanish-language betting content targeting US Hispanic audience. English 'gold cup final' (11K/mo) dominates but Spanish term 'copa oro final' (1.3K/mo) has lower competition. First-mover advantage for comprehensive Spanish Copa Oro final betting guide.
